author: ianna
body:
* Running scram b code-checks-all on a few core packages
* Correct by hand erroneous auto-correction
* Updating dependencies
* Second pass of code-checks-all

There are a few warnings left which have to be modified by hand, please see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/20510

Also there are a few unused variables reported - I did not correct these.

@civanch - FYI, the code and its dependencies compile fine. The purpose of this PR is to run full comparison.
title: Test for Simulation Packages Clang checks-all
